home.intro: I'm a developer focused on Ethereum & Web3, passionate about creating decentralized, secure and innovative solutions.
home.about: Here you'll find practical projects, smart contracts in Solidity, integrations with Ethers.js, security tips, and much more.

projects.title: Projects
projects.seedguard_desc: Store messages securely on the Ethereum blockchain. Save and retrieve texts protected by your wallet.
projects.kipubank_desc: Decentralized digital bank. Deposit, withdraw and check your ETH balance with limits and control via smart contract.
projects.cofre_desc: Manage Customer balance in a digital Vault. Deposit, withdraw and track internal transactions between Ethereum contracts.
projects.simpledex_desc: Simple DEX for Ethereum: add/remove liquidity, approve tokens, make swaps and view contracts. Modern frontend, integration with MetaMask and Ethers.js.
projects.blockchain3d_desc: Visualize blockchain and Ethereum concepts in 3D. Interact with blocks, transactions and contracts immersively.
